    • 方法详细资料

      • getDegree

        public double getDegree()
        从接口复制的说明: PhysicalObject
        Observer. Get degree of the physical object.
        返回:
        degree of the physical object

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        从接口复制的说明: PhysicalObject
        Observer. Get name of the physical object. This method should only perform in social network circle and stellar system.
        返回:
        name of the physical object

      • getDirect

        public boolean getDirect()
        从接口复制的说明: PhysicalObject
        Observer. Get direct of the physical object. This method should only perform in stellar system.
        返回:
        direct of the physical object, true if the direct is clockwise, false if the direct is counter-clockwise.

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        从接口复制的说明: PhysicalObject
        Observer. Get speed of the physical object. This method should only perform in stellar system.
        返回:
        speed of the physical object. The unit is kilogram per second.

      • getRaidus

        public double getRaidus()
        从接口复制的说明: PhysicalObject
        Observer. Get radius of the physical object. This method should only perform in stellar system.
        返回:
        radius of the physical object. The unit is kilometer.
